dcterms:description: The ChaLearn LAP IsoGD Dataset includes 47933 RGB-D depth sequences, each representing one gesture instance, with 249 gestures performed by 21 different individuals.
dcterms:title: ChaLearn LAP IsoGD Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Wang
W. Li
S. Liu
Y. Zhang
Z. Gao
P. Ogunbona
dcterms:description: The ChaLearn LAP ConGD Dataset consists of 47933 RGB-D gesture instances in 22535 RGB-D gesture videos, with 249 gestures performed by 21 different individuals.
dcterms:title: ChaLearn LAP ConGD Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: The NTU RGB+D Dataset is the largest action recognition dataset with over 56 thousand sequences and 4 million frames, containing 60 actions performed by 40 subjects.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D Dataset
